question:
When a solution of zinc chloride is added to a solution containing silver nitrate, a precipitate of silver chloride forms, according to the following chemical equation:

2AgNO[3](aq) + ZnCl[2](aq) --> Zn( NO[3] )[2](aq) + 2AgCl(s)

Which of the following shows the relative changes in the number of moles of each species over time?
